title: Which country has the best schools?
intro: How do you compare education systems? Beth and Phil discuss this and teach you some new vocabulary.
this_week_question: In 2022, Singapore was top of the reading rankings. But which of these countries came second? Was it:
a) The USA? b) Ireland? or c) The UK?
Listen to the programme to hear the answer.
